channel.title: Ancient switch command [PI]
channel.description:
Can anyone help me with this?
I have ::L and ::N working to switch between lunars and normal but everytime i do ::a for ancients, it will switch to ancients, the back to normal really fast. Anyone know where i messed up?
I am not on my computer atm, so i can't post code, but it is the same code as if switching at the altar

item.title: Ancient switch command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @justinkiller justinkiller
item.description:
@justinkiller wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("a")) {
c.playerMagicBook = 1;
}

That should work i believe.

Read full topic
